value.string:
Prerequisites: 
1. Please Place The Main_Config.xlsx File In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Config
2. Please place the credit risk matrix templates In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input\Credit Risk Matrix Templates
3. Rename those template files and follow the nomenclacure pattern "VendorID CompanyName Credit Risk Matrix Template"
e.g: 101594 Great Lakes Work Wear Credit Risk Matrix Template
4. Place "Customer List.csv" file in C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input

Task Name: MasterTask_CreditRiskMatrix_WithoutFSS 
Status:Initiated

Thanks,
Credit Risk Matrix Bot

Prerequisites: 
1. Please Place The Main_Config.xlsx File In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Config
2. Please place the credit risk matrix templates In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input\Credit Risk Matrix Templates
3. Rename those template files and follow the nomenclacure pattern "VendorID CompanyName Credit Risk Matrix Template"
e.g: 101594 Great Lakes Work Wear Credit Risk Matrix Template
4. Place "Customer List.csv" file in C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input
